medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Developed 2 days ago, progressed to more pronounced pain on the right side. Initially experienced constipation, which switched to watery nonbloody diarrhea after taking Senna yesterday. Pain was most pronounced when riding in the transport today. Mild nausea reported, no vomiting, with subjective fevers and chills at home.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anterior myocardial infarction, past surgical history includes LAD stent placement.
